titleStmt.title: SII 7.913: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 913. (A.R. No. 284 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmevu vaḷar tirupponmātu puṇara nāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalamperitu ciṟappa vicaiyamāmakaḷ velpuyat tiruppa Icaiyincelvi Eṇṭicai viḷaṅka nirupar van=tiṟaiñca niṇila maṭantaiyait tiru
maṇam puṇarntu cirvaḷar taruman maṇimuṭi kavittena tirumuṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattu palluyiṟ kellām Ellaiyi linpam Iyalvinil Iyal veṇkuṭai niḻaṟkiḻ ceṅko locci vāḻi pallūḻi Āḻi naṭappa
cempon vīrasiṁhāsanattu puvanavaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟirun=taruḷiya kovirājakecaripaṟmarāṉa tribhuvanaccakravarttikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu 5Āvatu malāṭākiya jana
nātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu tirukkovalūr Āḷuṭaiyār tiruviraṭṭānamuṭaiyār koyilil tiruppaḷḷiyaṟaiĀḷuṭaiyāḷukku tirunāyaṟṟukkiḻamaitoṟum puṟampe Eḻuntaruḷi tiruvolakkañce
ytu Amutuceytaruḷukaikku Irutūṇip patakkukkum maṟṟum veṇṭuvanattukku peṇṇainativāṇaṉ marakkālāl Irukalaney tūṇip patakkukkum kiḷiyūr malaiyamān malaiyan malaiyannāna kulottuṅkacoḻacce
tiyarāyan veṇṭikkoḷḷa Ivvāḷuṭaiyāḷukku Ivvūr sabhaiyom tānampaṇṇina nilamāvatu citārinilattukkuk kiḻakku cāraikkālil kiḻpoki vāykkālukku vaṭakku taṭi 6nāl kuḻi 1000 10 1vam Ikkā
lukku teṟku taṭi 4nāl kuḻi 6 100 3 10 8m kiḻpoki vāykkāl kuḻi 10 1m Itdevar devatānam cāṭṭumukkālukku kiḻakku Ālañcey taṭi 2nāl kuḻi 7 100 2 10m cākkiyan taṭi 1nāl kuḻi 3 100 2 10m
nakarattā n=taṭi 1nāl kuḻi 3 100m Ākak kuḻi muvāyirattāl nilam Onṟarai veliyum Ivvūr sabhaiyārai veṇṭikkoḷḷa In=niman=tam celvatāka Ikkoyil civabrāhaṇarppakkal viṭṭom
Ivvūr sabhaiyom Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.913 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
